EmailTemplate.name: Application Rejection Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Today}
{!IF(ISBLANK(CC_Application__c.Case_Number__c), "Application#: " + CC_Application__c.Name, "Case#: " + CC_Application__c.Case_Number__c)}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We regret to inform you that your Application has been rejected since you do not qualify the targeting criteria for the available waiver programs.
If you need additional help, please call your dedicated Healthcare case manager, or call Program Help Line at (XXX) XXX-XXXX.
Regards,
Consumer Connect
